field.label: Use own certificates
field.help: This will activate certificate based authentication (EAP-TLS) and validation (EAP-TTLS). Please choose CA and Certificate below and do not forget to roll out certificates to the clients. If you do not enable this, default installation certificate will be used.

field.label: Server Certificate
field.help: Choose the certificate the Radius service should use.

field.label: CRL
field.help: This enables CRL checking, please restart this service with every change to the CRL.
